title: Ban Me.
body:
I keep becoming toxic as I play this game.
I figure i'll just remove myself from the community.
Banning would help...

replies.body: You can request Riot to close your account by making a support ticket and asking them.

i used to type a ton in all chat, only focusing on that, then i turned of all chat and it actually helped me a ton, now instead of blaming an op champ i just blame my shitty fucking team even though everyone makes mistakes
If you already know he is toxic during your game, what exactly did you expect would happen when you accepted his friend invite???
I feel like you responded to the wrong thread

Banning you would be no justice... First you need to realize it's just a game. Second, try to improve your own behavior. Typically when we're pushed emotionally a persons true nature prevails. I suggest you work on this to not only improve your overall league experience but to also improve yourself for your own benefit in the real world.
just keep trolling and trying to ruin the game for every one that should work . its kinda fun too
